  • Summary

Welcome to the Election Officer Basics online training class!

It will take approximately 1 hour to view this training class. You can pause anytime.

Audio narration plays automatically for each slide. At the end of each narration, you will advance to the next slide automatically.

After reviewing the slides, you must take a quiz in the Election Officer Portal to receive credit and be eligible to serve as an election officer.

Start training

Helpful links:

  • Table of Contents - all slide titles on one page
  • Slides Thumbnails - all slide images on one screen
  • Slides Summary - all slide images and text side-by-side on one page

Questions? Call 703-324-4735 or email ElectionOfficerTraining@fairfaxcounty.gov. We are here to help!

About

This website was created by the Fairfax County Office of Elections.

If you are interested in serving as an election officer, you must first apply through the Election Officer Portal.

  • Election Officer Portal
  • Election Officer Application
  • Absentee Voting Information
